item.title: Postgres Optimizer
item.description: Postgres Optimizer Extend 对文章的技术性验证 These directories take the Query structure returned by the parser, and generate a plan used by the executor. The /plan directory generates the actual output plan, the /path code generates all possible ways to join the tables, and /prep handles various preprocessing steps for special cases. /util is utility stuff. /geqo is the separate “genetic optimization” planner —
